Martha the Innkeeper.Name: Martha the Innkeeper
Martha the Innkeeper.Description: A middle-aged woman with a warm smile and a knack for gossip. She runs The Rusty Flagon Inn with grace and efficiency.

Greeting: Welcome to The Rusty Flagon Inn! Make yourself at home.
If you're looking for a good night's rest, you've come to the right place.
Rumors: I've heard rumors of strange happenings in the old forest to the north...

Quest_start.Find_lost_shipment: We're expecting a shipment of rare wines. It's late. Could you investigate?

Borin Ironfist.Name: Borin Ironfist
Borin Ironfist.Description: A sturdy dwarf with a braided beard and a fiery temper. Borin is known for crafting some of the finest weapons and armor in the land.

Greeting: If it's not forged by me, it's not worth your time!
Need a weapon that's both sharp and sturdy? I can help with that.
Shop: Take a look at my wares. Finest craftsmanship in all the land!
Lore: The ore from the northern mines is the best I've worked with in years.

Elara Moonshadow.Name: Elara Moonshadow
Elara Moonshadow.Description: An enigmatic elf druid who spends her days tending to the ancient grove. Elara has deep knowledge of nature and healing.

Greeting: The forest speaks to those who listen.
Nature's balance must be maintained. How may I assist you?
Warning: Beware the shadows that linger after dusk.
Services: I can offer you herbs to aid in your journey.
